description: 1670 EXTRA wide aluminum jon boat in excellent condition.  Voyager measures their boats by the gunnel and not the floor. The widest floor measurement is 48". Boat is powered by a 1992 YAMAHA 30hp 2-stroke with electric start and full controls including a stick steer system that is mounted in front of the back seat to save interior space.  Motor has recently been serviced with a tune-up, new impeller and a new gas tank and fuel line.  Runs like most Yamahas do, excellent.  Custom made, easily removable bowfishing platform with a LED light bar across the front and four additional lights down the sides, as well as LED navigational lights. Comes with a flush mount front deck as well as a foldable duck blind.  All lights are less than a year old. (3) 31 series deep cycle batteries, (1) brand new, (2) less than a year old.  Brand  new marine pro 3 bank on board battery charger.  Brand new heavy duty trailer jack. Turn key silent bowfishing boat.  Minor paint wear in the interior but no dents or gouges on the underside.  Depth finder is less than a year old. I have current titles and registration for both boat and trailer. I have recently added a shooting rail on the deck for safety.  I will not sell the motor seperately from the boat.  $3850 CASH or might possibly trade for a 17ft or larger fiberglass skiff/work boat or a pontoon boat. $3500 CASH for the boat minus the bowfishing platform, lights,(2) batteries and the on-board charger. description: Asking $15,000 obo. I've owned this boat Since 2013. I bought it from a guy on Kerr Lake who only used it in fresh water.   Since I've owned it, I have only put it in salt water twice and flushed it every time. This boat and motor is rock solid.  Fires up every time!! I have NEVER had an issue with it either... it is a two stroke so it has plenty of torque. I bought a new trailer for it in 2014... 2014 25ft Aluminum Load Rite with surge disk brakes and bunks.
